attributes.name: aria-rowcount
attributes.description: Total number of rows in the data set

attributes.name: aria-colcount
attributes.description: Total number of columns in the table

attributes.name: role
attributes.description: ARIA role for the table

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Tab navigation order

tags.name: wb-theme
tags.description: Theme management component with dark/light modes and custom theme support

tags.name: wb-toggle
tags.description: Schema for wb-toggle custom element attributes

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label text displayed next to the toggle switch

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Whether the toggle is initially checked/on

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Size of the toggle switch

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description: Position of the label relative to the toggle

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Visual style variant of the toggle

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether the toggle is disabled

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Whether the toggle shows a loading state

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the toggle

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name attribute for form submission

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value submitted when toggle is checked

attributes.name: class
attributes.description: Additional CSS classes

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: Inline CSS styles

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Tooltip text shown on hover

attributes.name: onchange
attributes.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle state changes

attributes.name: onclick
attributes.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle is clicked

attributes.name: onfocus
attributes.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle gains focus

attributes.name: onblur
attributes.description: JavaScript code to execute when toggle loses focus

attributes.name: onwb-toggle:change
attributes.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-toggle:change event

attributes.name: role
attributes.description: ARIA role for accessibility

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.description: Accessible label for screen readers

attributes.name: aria-labelledby
attributes.description: ID of element that labels this toggle

attributes.name: aria-describedby
attributes.description: ID of element that describes this toggle

attributes.name: aria-checked
attributes.description: ARIA checked state (automatically managed)

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Tab navigation order

tags.name: wb-viewport
tags.description: Schema for wb-viewport custom element attributes

attributes.name: viewport
attributes.description: Current viewport size setting

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Custom width in pixels (for custom viewports)

attributes.name: show-controls
attributes.description: Whether to show viewport control buttons

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position of viewport controls

attributes.name: overlay
attributes.description: Whether to show viewport overlay indicator

attributes.name: transition-duration
attributes.description: Duration of viewport transition animations

attributes.name: custom-viewports
attributes.description: JSON string containing custom viewport definitions

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label text for the viewport simulator

attributes.name: help
attributes.description: Help text describing viewport functionality

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether the viewport controls are disabled

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the viewport

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name attribute for the viewport

attributes.name: class
attributes.description: Additional CSS classes

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: Inline CSS styles

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Tooltip text shown on hover

attributes.name: onchange
attributes.description: JavaScript code to execute when viewport changes

attributes.name: onreset
attributes.description: JavaScript code to execute when viewport is reset

attributes.name: onwb-viewport:change
attributes.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-viewport:change event

attributes.name: onwb-viewport:reset
attributes.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-viewport:reset event

attributes.name: onwb-viewport:ready
attributes.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-viewport:ready event

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.description: Accessible label for screen readers

attributes.name: aria-labelledby
attributes.description: ID of element that labels this viewport

attributes.name: aria-describedby
attributes.description: ID of element that describes this viewport

attributes.name: aria-live
attributes.description: How screen readers announce viewport changes

attributes.name: role
attributes.description: ARIA role for the viewport component

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Tab navigation order
